page.title: 18 Local Surnames
page.content: In Whitstable there are names that have been here along time.My name, Whorlow,has been in Whitstable since the 17th century.Here is a list of surnames. {Amos,Appleton,Austin,Beer,Bills,Black- {man,Blyth,Bright,Browning,Camburn, {Castle,Collar,Dadd,Dale,Daniel,Foad, {Foreman,Frend,Fryer,Gambrill,Gann,Had_ {ler,Harman,Harnett,Harvey.Hatton,Hee- {son,Hockless,Hook,Horne,Jordan,Keam, {Kemp,Laraman,Lawson,Lott,Luckhurst, {Marsh,Merritt,Monk,Mount,Newing,Nutten {Packman,Payne,Payton,Philpot,Pierce, {Porter,Reed,Reeves,Rigden,Rowden,Sells {Shilling,Shingleston,Stroud,Tilley, {Tritton,Uden,Walters,Waters,Whorlow. Often local poeple were given nick- names according to their looks and characteristics.{Care Olive,Shrimp {Rigden,Strawberry Nosed Roberts,Brainy {Whorlow,Leggy Dale,Boots Kendall.
